# ElectricityGuidance.Options.guidanceIncorporatesRatePlan

**Case**

Indicates whether the electricity guidance incorporated rate plan information.

## Declaration

```swift
case guidanceIncorporatesRatePlan
```

## Discussion

An [doc://com.apple.energykit/documentation/EnergyKit/EnergyVenue] may have rate plan information, but the person may have opted out of using rate plan for guidance.

## Getting the options

- **ElectricityGuidance.Options.locationHasRatePlan**: Indicates whether the energy venue where the guidance was generated has rate plan information available.
